name: Legging It
description:
You are an amputee. You've just been caught in a fight and as you run away your leg falls off. You need to use your leg to get away from the people chasing you using its built in abilities.

Controls

Grapple - Hold Left Mouse Button

Slow Motion - E

Crouch - Left Control

(I've only been developing on Unity for 2 weeks so don't expect brilliance)
